QuestData.Title: Just A Folk Story
QuestData.Description: What!?! This don't make any sense! <Fish's face falls.>$B$BWhat's this mumber jumber about a maiden and an ancestor and a buncha stairs?$B$BI can't make any reason outta this, can you?$B$BWell, there are lotsa folks 'round here who're much older than you and me, $n.$B$BCan you go talk to the folks in Halfhill? I betcha they might know somethin'!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Grainsorter Pei, Stonecarver Mac, Mama Min, and Old Man Whitewhiskers.
